title: How to invest your money (and not wreck the climate)

media:group.media:title: How to invest your money (and not wreck the climate)
media:group.media:description:
Watch my companion video about crypto as a green investment over on Nebula, available in partnership with CuriosityStream: https://www.curiositystream.com/simonclark

After a very expensive year, I wanted to learn how to invest my finally-free savings in a way that would achieve two objectives:
1) Not make the climate crisis worse
2) Help contribute to solutions to the climate crisis
This video is the outcome of my personal research, in which I introduce you to various investment options and how to make climate-friendly decisions in each case. This isn't comprehensive or the opinion of an expert! Just a concerned citizen trying to use their savings to help fix the mess we find ourselves in.

Along the way I was ably assisted by my friend and money guru Ali Abdaal, check out his channel: https://youtube.com/aliabdaal

Video about how to invest your money in a way that doesn't cause climate change or contribute to the climate crisis, which stocks to pick which shares to pick to minimise climate impact, which ETFs are best for climate change, should I use a robo-investor like Betterment or Wealthify and can they help with the climate crisis. In this video essay I tell you what I learned about low carbon investment options and how to make your savings help the climate crisis.
